name: Outside (itch) (0utdetad)
description:
Outside is a 2d game in development made by 3 young people who decided to join the creation within the game world.

Introduction ...

As part of the PAP (Professional Aptitude Test) we intend to make a 2D game (two dimensions) in Unity (program to develop games).

The idea for this project came about because we have always seen video games as one of the best artistic mediums and we decided that we wanted to make one also applying our computer skills.

With this game we intend to stimulate reasoning through the resolution of puzzles and combat strategies.

Project description ...

The game's theme is an RPG (Roleplaying game) with a turn-based combat style whose objective is to escape from a dungeon where the protagonist has been imprisoned. To do this, the protagonist will have to defeat enemies to go to the next level and solve puzzles to obtain the keys to open the door to his freedom.

The resources that will be Unity for creating the game, Visual Studio 2019 for creating Scripts for the game, Mega for storing project data and Paint.Net for designing the game.

Directed by Hugo Barros, Ricardo Gomes and Angelo Costa.
